alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 11:12AM EST until January 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Connecticut, northern portions of Fairfield and New Haven Counties. In New Jersey, Western Bergen County. In New York, Rockland and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact both the evening and morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher elevations are expected to receive more of the wintry precipitation and are expected to receive this wintry precipitation this afternoon but coverage will likely be patchy. Otherwise, for the rest of the area with lower elevations, more of this wintry precipitation will occur tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
